wie lange zusammen: How long have you been together?
privacy policy text: By clicking on the button 'create account' you agree to our privacy policy. You can find this under
partnerAdd Text: Here you can connect with your partner. You have to enter the code of the other one (only capital letters)
partnerAdd Reboot: Restart the app once you have added yourself
an bq arbeiten: Now let's work out your relationship qualities
bq-test absolvieren:
Hey!
You haven't even taken the partnership test yet. Do you want to do that now?
partner hinzu note:
Hey!
You haven't yet added your partner. Do you want to do that now?
